basic_math module¶

basic_math.is_prime(a)[source]¶

Returns true if a is prime and false otherwise

>>> is_prime(3)
True
>>> is_prime(1)
False
>>> is_prime(4)
False
basic_math.mul(a, b)[source]¶

Returns the value of a multiplied by b

Parameters:
  • a (int.) – The first multiple
  • b – The second multiple
Returns:

int – Equal to a * b
basic_math.mul_div(a, b, c=1)[source]¶

Returns a*b/c
